sectionMetadata.reason: Hero block has full-bleed gradient background as part of its design, not section container styling

authoringDecisions.reason: Logo/branding is handled by the header block, not page content

authoringDecisions.originalDescription: Eyebrow text 'Enter Your Details' followed by large italic heading 'Illuminate Possibilities'
authoringDecisions.reason: Prominent page introduction with eyebrow, heading - perfect Hero block use case

authoringDecisions.originalDescription: Location dropdown with label 'Where are you located?' and Canadian provinces
authoringDecisions.reason: Interactive form element cannot be authored in Word/Docs. Requires custom JavaScript implementation. For migration, note this as placeholder text.
authoringDecisions.migrationNote: Form functionality requires custom development. Content placeholder: 'Where are you located? Select your location'

authoringDecisions.originalDescription: Age verification with date of birth dropdowns (DD/MM/YYYY)
authoringDecisions.reason: Interactive age gate cannot be authored in Word/Docs. Requires custom JavaScript implementation.
authoringDecisions.migrationNote: Age verification form requires custom development

authoringDecisions.originalDescription: Remember me checkbox and 'Enter Luo' call-to-action button
authoringDecisions.reason: The 'Enter Luo' button is the call-to-action for the Hero block. Checkbox is form functionality.
authoringDecisions.migrationNote: Remember me checkbox requires custom JavaScript

authoringDecisions.reason: Decorative image that can be included as an image element after the hero content
Language selector is a site-wide navigation concern, handled by header/footer blocks

consolidatedBlocks.notes: Hero block will handle the gradient background styling. Form elements are functional requirements beyond content migration.

section1.reason: Background gradient is part of the Hero block's design, not section container styling. Hero blocks typically have their own background treatment.

migrationNotes: This page is a gateway/age-gate landing page with form functionality
The Hero block captures the main visual content (heading, CTA)
Form elements (location dropdown, age verification, remember me) require custom JavaScript development
The gradient background should be implemented as Hero block styling or background image
Language selector handled by site navigation, not page content
